snippet.title: Duke Nukem Forever 2001 Restoration Project is here! | MVG
snippet.description:
The team at Mighty Foot Productions have carefully restored the 2001 version of Duke Nukem Forever, said to be by most the definitive version of the game. Known as Duke Nukem Forever 2001 Restoration Project, it features as a first slice - the first 9 levels of the game lovingly restored with all new features and its OUT NOW! In this episode we take a closer look

► Support the Channel  - https://www.patreon.com/ModernVintageGamer

► DNF2001 RP Download : https://www.moddb.com/mods/dnf2001-restoration-project/downloads/duke-nukem-restoration-first-slice-10
► DNF2001 RP Twitter : https://twitter.com/DNF2001RP
► DNF2001 RP Discord :  https://discord.gg/4eBDeUeQbN

Social Media Links :

► Check me out on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ModernVintageGamer
► BandCamp : https://modernvintagegamer.bandcamp.com/
► The Real MVP Podcast : https://player.fm/series/the-real-mvp
► Follow me on Twitter : https://twitter.com/ModernVintageG

#dukenukemforever #hailtotheking
